name: JetCar (game + source code)
description:
A simple racing game where you pilot a futuristic car with a jet engine!
You have to overtake other cars and avoid hitting them!

It features a pixel art style and retro chiptune music.
All assets are made by me.

The game was made in Python 3.8  using Pygame. You can take a look at the source code and hopefully learn something new.
